metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12415 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Apache POI up to 4.1.0, when using the tool XSSFExportToXml to convert user-provided Microsoft Excel documents, a specially crafted document can allow an attacker to read files from the local filesystem or from internal network resources via XML External Entity (XXE) Processing.

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
